channel.title: Axillary Meristem on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Axillary Meristem on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaBLIND
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaBLIND|CaBL Gene Name: BLIND Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaBLIND|CaBL regulates axillary meristem initiation and transition to flowering in pepper.

item.title: FON2;FON4
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os11g38270 RAPdb gene ID: Os11g0595400 Gene Symbol: FON2 FON4 TG1 Gene Name: Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: FveFT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_4g30710 Gene Symbol: FveFT2 Gene Name: FLOWERING LOCUS T 2 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: The FveFT2 florigen/FveTFL1 antiflorigen balance is critical for the control of seasonal flowering in strawberry while FveFT3 modulates axillary meristem fate and yield.

item.title: GmSPL9d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G177500 Gene Symbol: GmSPL9d Gene Name: SQUAMOSA PROMOTER BINDING PROTEIN-LIKE9 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmSPL9d is expressed in the shoot apical meristem and axillary meristems (AMs) of soya bean.
